arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Bologna – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma and Bologna go head-to-head in Serie A on Saturday. Both sides will be searching for a positive start to the 2025/26 season, as Roma aim to build on their exceptional form from last season’s run-in, while Bologna look to continue exceeding expectations in Serie A.
